level.text: Failure to pay an assessed contribution to the DC USTF shall be deemed a violation of this chapter.

If the Commission determines after notice and hearing that an ETC has acted in violation of this chapter, the Commission may file an action on behalf of the DC USTF to recover any unpaid fees and charges the Commission has determined are due and payable, including interest, administrative and adjudicative costs, and attorney fees. Upon collection of the above charges and costs, the Fund Administrator shall pay the costs of the actions and deposit the remaining funds in the DC USTF as appropriate.
